definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Before the store opened, countered the prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 在商店開門之前，犯人應道。

sentences.english: The judge told the prisoner the jury had acquitted him of the charge of bigamy.
sentences.chinese: 法官告訴犯人陪審團撤消對他重婚罪的指控。

sentences.english: The prisoner had on his feet fetters weighing fifty pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這犯人的腳上有一對五十斤重的鐵球。

sentences.english: So I asked the other prisoners what to do.
sentences.chinese: 於是我就問其他犯人怎麼辦。

sentences.english: In the Asian version of this execution, the victim would stand upright and the sawing would begin at the top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲版的鋸刑中，犯人是站直的，行刑從頭部開始。

sentences.english: The judge was lenient with the wrongdoer.
sentences.chinese: 法官對這個犯人很寬大。

sentences.english: Socialist organizations called for the culprits to be hunted down.
sentences.chinese: 社會主義團體呼籲將這些犯人緝拿歸案。

sentences.english: The jailor brought up another livid prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 那個獄卒又帶來了一個面無人色的犯人。

sentences.english: Prisoners are women, it seems as persona non grata, give up on themselves to become.
sentences.chinese: 犯人是名女性，好像因爲不受歡迎，而變得自暴自棄。

sentences.english: The police searched for the criminal throughout the mountain.
Also in mock trials judges give longer prison sentences to ugly people.
sentences.chinese: 在模擬審判中，法官會判醜的犯人更長的徒刑。

sentences.english: These cruel devices are designed to stop prisoners bending their legs.
sentences.chinese: 這些殘酷的刑具是用來阻止犯人彎腿的。

sentences.english: Low hilly terrain all around. A HUNDRED CONS are at work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是丘嶺，一百多個犯人正在田地上工作。

sentences.english: The prisoners are allowed out for an hour's exercise each day.
sentences.chinese: 犯人每天有一小時的放風時間。

sentences.english: They tied their prisoner up with a piece of rope.
sentences.chinese: 他們用繩索把犯人捆起來。

sentences.english: The ex-convict Brevet wore the black and gray waistcoat of the central prisons.
sentences.chinese: 老犯人布萊衛穿件中央監獄的灰黑色褂子。

definition: prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
